sequence:
Shiranui, the Do-It-All Shopkeeper

<size=45>Chapter 5: The Shopkeeper's Abnormality</size>

scripts.say: On this day of rest, I found myself headed to the bushes outside the store as always, with plans to observe Shiranui.
... Eh? As always? Come to think of it, I've been observing Shiranui for quite some time now.
Although she wears the same aloof expression both during work and during her everyday life,  her behavior shows that she is certainly not some callous ice queen.
Commander, just what are you doing camping out in those bushes? Should I trim them to make them more accomodating for you?

options.content: Ask about when she found out

scripts.say: Well, since Shiranui seems to have found me, there's no point staying hidden.
From the very beginning. Since you weren't getting in the way of business, how you choose to spend your time off is your own prerogative. It's up to you, Commander.
However, for you to come every single weekend...wouldn't any normal person start to believe that you have some loose screws?
Looking at things from her perspective, she certainly has a point!

options.content: Express your desire to understand Shiranui better

scripts.say: So, Commander, tell me what are you looking at?
... You're an idiot after all. If you wanted to know, you could have just asked me directly.
If I did that, I would have just been treated like an idiot! Although this...
Huh...? There's no need for that. Commander surely has other responsibilities, so I can handle things here by myself.
That's right. Shiranui always knows how to handle things well without anybody else's help.
She never seems to need to rely on anyone, always managing all aspects of the store by herself as if it was second nature. However...
Commander, don't just stand there like an idiot. If you have time to burn...
Before she could finish her words, Shiranui's body began to sway, as if she was about to collapse.
Don't worry, I just got a little dizzy...
You should pay Akashi a visit anyway.
